item.title: Microsoft delay changes the vista
item.description: SEATTLE — Microsoft Corp.’s delay in releasing the consumer version of its new Windows operating system is a blow to companies that make and sell computers.

item.title: KC online advertising firm gets a $48 million shot in the arm
item.description: Adknowledge, a Kansas City online advertising firm, has received a $48 million investment from one of the nation’s top venture-capital firms.

item.title: GADGET CHECK: A mega phone
item.description: ■ Snapshot: Some recent announcements show just how far the U.S. is behind the rest of the world in the wireless phone biz. Samsung recently showed off a new 10-megapixel camera phone that will be available in South Korea this spring, and a second phone with an 8-gigabyte hard drive that will be available in Europe at about the same time. The new Samsung SCH-B600 looks like a cell phone on one side and a digital camera on the other. It has a 3x optical zoom, 5x digital zoom, 1/2,000th of...

item.title: WEB REVIEW: Blogging for dollars
item.description: Looking for bargains and cool things to buy on the Web can be a full-time job. Here are some bloggers who pass along the deals they find.
